alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 8:09PM CST until March 07 at 12:42AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Valley Park. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River at Pacific. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Steelville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Agricultural and recreational areas along the right bank flood. At Adventure Outdoors west of Steelville, the store begins to flood near this height. At 14.0 feet, Near this height, roads to the Lucky Clover campgrounds begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 15.0 feet and cresting. - Recent Activity...The river rose above flood stage Saturday morning and has neared a crest. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 2.9 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Meramec River Steelville 12.0 15.0 9.1 5.6 4.1 3.4 3.0 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
